author: wrowe
msg: Patch to allow %qd within apr_snprintf, but handle the platform specific
APR_INT64_T_FMT string regardless (e.g. older lld or win32 I64d).

author: stoddard
msg: Win32: Include WAIT_TIMEOUT in the APR_STATUS_IS_ETIMEDOUT check.

author: stoddard
msg: APRize WAIT_TIMEOUT before return from apr_sendfile()

author: trawick
msg: Fix a problem on unixware where clearing h_errno wouldn't work.

author: trawick
msg: Add a family field to apr_sockaddr_t so there is a straightforward place
to look to find the address family.  (Yes, it could be found in
addr->sa.sin.sin_family even if it was not an AF_INET socket but that
Also, try fairly hard to get the port field filled out properly.
